description: Cinemagazine items including: 1. Bouquinistes on the River Seine. 2. Castillo - showing of his 1967-68 fashion designs. 3. Exhibition of "old time" posters from 1900 - art by Toulous le Trec is a part of this collection. 4. Behind the scenes look at Jean Luc Godard at work on his new film "Weekend". 5. "Phoenetic Art" is on exhibition with the theme of "Light and Movement" at the Paris Museum of Modern Art.
